entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
